replies.body:
Me likey. Definitely going to try in my next Illoai game :D

Can you please link me your match history for that game so I can look at runes/masteries and build order?

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/124141924/200594755

I got curious and searched for it myself, might try it as well XD

Full build is 

{{item:3812}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3074}} {{item:1301}} 

and runes and masteries are link with Telecasterdude's post

HOWEVER, i change deathfires touch to Warlord's Bloodlust, because of its changes, you can still use deathfire's if you'd like but i think that the change to warlord's makes it a bit more effective 
BUT thank you i had made another post bout this particular thing and got shat on, because everyone thought it was really dumb,
so thanks :)
ya but like, one stun and u ded
Can you post a build order at least? I know the items needed to do this but build order really matters with these funny builds.

Build order only matters on what enemy you fight, but usually i would rush deaths dance first, attack speed boots leave the enchanmetn till later, then if its and ad champ black cleaver, if not, spirit visage, then into hextech, then black clever/ or visage, then rav

It certainly does synergize with her kit well, but be aware that if you miss your spells then the spellvamp will not be that useful! Seen as she has a couple of skillshots for spells you have to focus on making each one of them count!

Seems like an interesting concept though. Might have to give it a go!
